news.title: Bohemian F.C. announce Gaza fundraising market this weekend and new charity shirt
news.summary: The market will be open Saturday, August 23 from 10:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m at Dalymount Park.

news.title: Festivals are becoming the new family holiday, according to Ticketmaster report
news.summary: Festivals are becoming a family affair according to Ticketmaster's PlayReport that surveyed 2000 UK adults who attended a festival in the last 5 years

news.title: Nick Mulvey: "I've got great respect and love for Irish culture"
news.summary: On the eve of an extensive Irish tour, indie-folk maestro Nick Mulvey discusses his stunning brace of new albums, Dark Harvest, Pt.1 & Pt.2.

news.title: Sharon Van Etten and The Attachment Theory at Cork Opera House (Photos)
Minister for Culture announces over €250,000 in capital grants for arts and culture organisations
news.summary: Recipients of the funding include facilities in Cork, Waterford, Galway, Limerick, Westmeath, Dublin and Tipperary

news.title: UN-backed experts declare "man-made" famine in Gaza City
news.summary: "As this Famine is entirely man-made, it can be halted and reversed," the IPC report reads. "The time for debate and hesitation has passed, starvation is present and is rapidly spreading."
